verses.verse: <S%G80>Brethren<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G2532><s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G4301>overtaken<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5100>a<s%> <S%G3900>fault<s%>, <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G4152>spiritual<s%>, <S%G2675>restore<s%> such an <S%G5108>one<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4236>meekness<s%>; <S%G4648>considering<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%>, <S%G3361>lest<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G3985>tempted<s%>. if: or, although

<S%G1063>For<s%> if a <S%G1536>man<s%> think <S%G1380>himself<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%>, when he <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%>, he <S%G5422>deceiveth<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>.
<S%G1161>Let<s%> him that is <S%G2727>taught<s%> in the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2841>communicate<s%> unto him that <S%G2727>teacheth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> good <S%G18>things<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> he that <S%G4687>soweth<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2325>shall<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G5356>corruption<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> he that <S%G4687>soweth<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2325>shall<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> let <S%G1573>us<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G1573>weary<s%> in <S%G2570>well<s%> <S%G4160>doing<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> in <S%G2398>due<s%> <S%G2540>season<s%> we shall <S%G2325>reap<s%>, if we <S%G1590>faint<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>.

<S%G5613>As<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G686>therefore<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2540>opportunity<s%>, let us <S%G2038>do<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men, <S%G1161>especially<s%> <S%G3122><s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> them who are of the <S%G3609>household<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>.
Ye <S%G1492>see<s%> how <S%G4080>large<s%> a <S%G1121>letter<s%> I have <S%G1125>written<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> with mine <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>.

As many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G2309>desire<s%> to make a fair <S%G2146>shew<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G3778>they<s%> <S%G315>constrain<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> to be <S%G4059>circumcised<s%>; <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> they should suffer <S%G1377>persecution<s%> for the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> they <S%G846>themselves<s%> who are <S%G4059>circumcised<s%> <S%G5442>keep<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G4059>have<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G4059>circumcised<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5212>your<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> God <S%G3361>forbid<s%> <S%G1096><s%> that <S%G1698>I<s%> should <S%G2744>glory<s%>, <S%G1508>save<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> is <S%G4717>crucified<s%> unto <S%G1698>me<s%>, and <S%G2504>I<s%> unto the <S%G2889>world<s%>. by whom: or, whereby

<S%G2532>And<s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G4748>walk<s%> according <S%G2583>to<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G2583>rule<s%>, <S%G1515>peace<s%> be <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2474>Israel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.
